p: The three SNPs (rs12681349, rs10503253, and rs1983474) of CSMD1 gene were selected from NCBI database ( http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/projects/SNP) and SNPinfo ( https://snpinfo.niehs.nih.gov/snpfunc/.htm). Genome-wide association studies ( http://pdgene.org/) have shown that allele frequencies of above of them were â‰¥0.2. Their functions were captured in the published literature.
